plot: Nolan and Rafe race against the clock to rescue Amanda and Pottinger trapped in a deadly mine collapse.

Ambassador Olfin Tennety's return to Defiance for a tour of the mine is short-lived after she dies in a cave-in. Amanda and Mayor Pottinger survive but are trapped behind the rockfall. It's up to Nolan and Berlin to climb down an adjacent shaft to rescue them. Nolan finds evidence that the cave-in was anything but accidental. Rafe has a suspect in mind. Alak has broken off his relationship with Deirdre and is doing his best to make things up to Christie. Deirdre refuses to give on him. Meanwhile, Nolan is keeping Irisa close - and in handcuffs - after he catches her breaking into the E-Rep compound attempting to steal a terrasphere. Irisa remains undaunted in her quest.—garykmcd
